name: Empty Heaven - Jam Edition
description:
"The last thing I wanna do before I die is fill out paperwork." - Our Boss

Welcome to Willllllll - I-n-ccccc! Following the woooordz of our founding fATHer is one of our utmost priorities, and you have been selected for a special PROject! Stay a while! Ennnnnjoxxufobfajfby yourself! ANDDd the tissuez are at the gift shop...

This game was made for the #agbic game jam. There are two versions that will be released for the jam. One is the Chop Demo, which is an incomplete showcase of some awesome post processing settings that didn't make it to final release. It is extremely incomplete, with large boxes everywhere, and no way to exit or finish the game.

The Second File is the game! Play it now! The game at this point is a showcase of models and code scripts that I will use in later projects. Stay Tuned!

Third File is credits.

<Recommended you play in Windowed mode.>

Enjoy.
